intro.p: Maps a one to one association.

note.p: Please note that the 'blogid' foreign key lies on the 'Post' table.

section.title: BelongsToAttribute(String column)
section.p: Indicates the name of the column to be used on the association. Usually the name of the foreign key field on the underlying database.
